p:
A cell-grown, reverse genetics produced wild-type (H1N1)pdm09 influenza A virus was used for intranasal challenge. This GMP-manufactured challenge virus was developed in NIAID by the LID Clinical Studies Unit and has been described in previous trials
22, 33 . A total of 10 7 TCID 50 of challenge virus in sterile saline was delivered in two 500 μl preferred term doses intranasally using the MAD TM Nasal sprayer device (Wolfe-Tory Medical, Inc., Salt Lake City, UT).
